en-US.description: This is a quick skill to brush up on United States capital cities. Each quick quiz consists of 5 randomly questions for you to match the states with their capital cities. If your device has a screen you will see pictures related to the states and their capitols. Good luck!
en-US.name: State Capitals Quiz
en-US.summary: This is a quiz of the capital cities in the United States.
en-US.updatesDescription:
You now have the option to continue taking quizzes without restarting the skill. 
Pictures have been added for screen enabled devices.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This is a simple question and response skill with no special instructions for hardware or account info.
